text: Hagi ana'ma hutenka amanage hunka huo. Ama avontafe'ma atrogeno timpima uramiaza huno, Babiloni kumamo'a uramino ome fanane huteno, ete ora otigahie. Na'ankure Nagra ra hazenke atresugeno eno eme zamazeri haviza hanige'za zamasafeku hugahaze. Jeremaia'ma hu'nea kasnampa nanekemo'a amare eme vagare'ne.
